# Research articles


# Books

For books about moral psychology and moral philosophy for a general audience:

- **Moral Tribes** *Joshua Greene*

- **The Righteous Mind & The Happiness Hypothesis** *Jonathon Haidt*

- **Just Babies & Against Empathy** *Paul Bloom*

- **Justice: What's the right thing to do?** *Michael Sandel*

- **What It Means to Be Moral** *Phil Zuckerman*


# Talks

- <u>[**Our buggy moral code**](https://www.ted.com/talks/dan_ariely_our_buggy_moral_code?language=en)</u> *Dan Ariely*

- <u>[**Moral behavior in animals**](https://www.ted.com/talks/frans_de_waal_moral_behavior_in_animals?language=en)</u> *Frans de waal*


- <u>[**The moral roots of liberals and conservatives**](https://www.ted.com/talks/jonathan_haidt_the_moral_roots_of_liberals_and_conservatives)</u> *Jonathan Haidt*

- <u>[**Science can answer moral questions**](https://www.ted.com/talks/sam_harris_science_can_answer_moral_questions)</u> *Sam Harris*


- <u>[**Progress is not a zero sum game**](https://www.ted.com/talks/robert_wright_progress_is_not_a_zero_sum_game)</u> *Robert Wright*
